name: Arenal Volcano
description: Arenal Volcano (Spanish: Volcán Arenal) is an active andesitic stratovolcano in north-western Costa Rica around 90 km (56 mi) northwest of San José, in the province of Alajuela, canton of San Carlos, and district of La Fortuna.

name: Parque Nacional Volcán Turrialba
description: A national park featuring the active Turrialba Volcano, known for its hiking trails and diverse wildlife.

name: Selvatura Adventure Park
description: An adventure park offering canopy tours, zip-lining, and suspension bridges through the cloud forest.
